pages.text: Linking up nether portals can be a pain! Fortunately, we include a datapack which takes all the guesswork out of the equation. Simply type $(o)/function nether_portal_coords:overworld$() or $(o)/function nether_portal_coords:nether$() (based on your current dimension). You'll see a message telling you where to place a portal in the other dimension to properly link them!

pages.title: Smaller Portals
pages.text: Smaller nether portals can be generated with sizes as small as 1x2! More information on curseforge: $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/smaller-nether-portals)Smaller Nether Portals$(/l)
